subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Fate and the N.B.A. schedule-makers have arranged a timely reunion Sunday night in L.A., where Mike D’Antoni will make his Lakers coaching debut against a Rockets team led by Jeremy Lin.
snippet: Fate and the N.B.A. schedule-makers have arranged a timely reunion Sunday night in L.A., where Mike D’Antoni will make his Lakers coaching debut against a Rockets team led by Jeremy Lin.
